Description of incident: Schwab Retirement Plan Services Inc. (SRPS), notified customers of a data breach when a spreadsheet containing Social Security numbers, names, addresses, dates of birth, dates of termination, employment status, division code, marital status and account balance was accidentally emailed to a participant in another retirement plan serviced by SRPS.For those affected they can call 1-800-724-7526.More information: http://oag.ca.gov/system/files/Participant%20Incident%20Notification%20T...?
